resourceProperties.title: targetClass
resourceProperties.name: targetClass
resourceProperties.description: Type or types of resource described by this shape

resourceProperties.title: targetSubjectsOf
resourceProperties.name: targetSubjectsOf
resourceProperties.description: Type or types of resource described by this shape

resourceProperties.title: targetObjectsOf
resourceProperties.name: targetObjectsOf
resourceProperties.description: Type or types of resource described by this shape

resourceProperties.title: RDF Type
resourceProperties.name: type
resourceProperties.description: Type or types of resource described by this shape

resourceProperties.title: Properties
resourceProperties.name: property
resourceProperties.description: The properties that are allowed or required by this shape

resourceProperties.name: path
resourceProperties.description: path of a property

resourceProperties.title: Class
resourceProperties.name: classType
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the Class of a node

resourceProperties.title: Min Count
resourceProperties.name: minCount
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the min count

resourceProperties.title: Max Count
resourceProperties.name: maxCount
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the max count

resourceProperties.title: Range Min Exclusive
resourceProperties.name: minExclusive
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the range: Min Exclusive

resourceProperties.title: Range Max Exclusive
resourceProperties.name: maxExclusive
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the range: Max Exclusive

resourceProperties.title: Range Min Inclusive
resourceProperties.name: minInclusive
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the range: Min Inclusive

resourceProperties.title: Range Max Inclusive
resourceProperties.name: maxInclusive
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the range: Max Inclusive

resourceProperties.title: Minimum Length
resourceProperties.name: minLength
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the minimum string length of each value node that satisfies the condition.

resourceProperties.title: Maximum Length
resourceProperties.name: maxLength
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the maximum string length of each value node that satisfies the condition.

resourceProperties.title: Pattern
resourceProperties.name: pattern
resourceProperties.description: Specifies a regular expression that each value node matches to satisfy the condition.

resourceProperties.title: LanguageIn
resourceProperties.name: languageIn
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the allowed language tags for each value node limited by a given list of language tags.

resourceProperties.title: UniqueLang
resourceProperties.name: uniqueLang
resourceProperties.description: Specifies that no pair of value nodes may use the same language tag if set true.

resourceProperties.title: Name
resourceProperties.name: name
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the name

resourceProperties.title: Description
resourceProperties.name: description
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the description

resourceProperties.name: order
resourceProperties.description: Sets the order of a property

resourceProperties.name: group
resourceProperties.description: Indicate that the shape belongs to a group of related property shapes

resourceProperties.name: severity
resourceProperties.description: The specific values of sh:severity have no impact on the validation, but may be used by user interface tools to categorize validation results.

resourceProperties.title: Message
resourceProperties.name: message
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the message to be shown in resultMessage of Validation report

resourceProperties.title: Node
resourceProperties.name: node
resourceProperties.description: sh:node specifies the condition that each value node conforms to the given node shape.

resourceProperties.name: equals
resourceProperties.description: sh:equals specifies the condition that the set of all value nodes is equal to the set of objects of the triples that have the focus node as subject and the value of sh:equals as predicate.

resourceProperties.name: disjoint
resourceProperties.description: sh:disjoint specifies the condition that the set of value nodes is disjoint with the set of objects of the triples that have the focus node as subject and the value of sh:equals as predicate.

resourceProperties.name: lessThan
resourceProperties.description: sh:lessThan specifies the condition that each value node is smaller than all the objects of the triples that have the focus node as subject and the value of sh:lessThan as predicate.

resourceProperties.name: lessThanOrEquals
resourceProperties.description: sh:lessThanOrEquals specifies the condition that each value node is smaller than or equal to all the objects of the triples that have the focus node as subject and the value of sh:lessThanOrEquals as predicate.

resourceProperties.name: hasValue
resourceProperties.description: sh:hasValue specifies the condition that at least one value node is equal to the given RDF term.

resourceProperties.name: in
resourceProperties.description: specifies the condition that each value node is a member of a provided SHACL list.

resourceProperties.title: Data Type
resourceProperties.name: datatype
resourceProperties.description: See list of allowed values for sh:datatype

resourceProperties.title: Node Kind
resourceProperties.name: nodeKind
resourceProperties.description: Specifies the node kind. Values can be: sh:BlankNode, sh:IRI, sh:Literal, sh:BlankNodeOrIRI, sh:BlankNodeOrLiteral and sh:IRIOrLiteral
